title: i lag
body: i go to costume and i have 65 ping but when i go to ranked dolo duo or flex my pings goes over 250 and i am the only one conected to the internett plsssss tell me what i can do ****

replies.body: Regardless of game mode, you're pinging to the same game server so this may actually be an unstable connection misleading as a coincidence.  I recommend using custom games only for now and going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your settings and improve network strength.
